name: MOVE DATA IN MEMORY
description: This command will move a specified number of characters from one location to another without concern to type or individual field sizes.
syntax:
XFER FROM from_field TO to_field NCHR number_of_characters FMEM from_mem_area#
TMEM to_mem_area#

parameters.name: number_of_characters
parameters.description: The number of characters to move.

parameters.name: FMEM
parameters.description: from_mem_area# - f/c/e - Optional - The memory area number to transfer from. This must resolve to a value from 1 through 4. If you specify this value then the from_field is evaluated as the offset within this area.

parameters.name: TMEM
parameters.description: to_mem_area# - f/c/e - Optional - The memory area number to transfer to.
